name: Imitation Bison Cauliflower Salad!!!
description:
I made this game in exactly 3 hours for Trijam 144. Follow the "Life Line" back to your house. When you've reached the house, congratulations, you win!!! Along the way, see if you can spot all 5 purple headed figures. There is no music so while you play hum one of your favourite songs...

Controls

WASD - move
space - jump
escape - pause
right click - zoom in
